Module com.cameronm.inventorymanager
Package com.cameronm.inventorymanager.controllers

Class MainController

java.lang.Object
com.cameronm.inventorymanager.controllers.MainController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MainController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The MainController class controls the logic of the Main window of the application.
Since:
2023-02-02
Version:
1.0
Author:
Cameron M

    The exitProgram method displays a confirmation popup when the user attempts to exit the program, if the user clicks "OK", the program closes, otherwise the program remains open.

    The initialize method initializes buttons and populates tables.

    The modifyPartButtonClicked method passes the part selected in the part table on the main screen to the addOrModifyPart method for modification and passes a title for the window.

    modifyProductButtonClicked()
    The modifyProductButtonClicked method passes the product selected in the product table on the main screen to the addOrModifyProduct method for modification and passes a title for the window.
    (package private) static void
    partSearchTextField(javafx.scene.control.TextField textField, javafx.scene.control.TableView<Part> partTable, javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<Part,Integer> idColumn, javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<Part,String> nameColumn, javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<Part,Integer> inventoryColumn, javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<Part,Double> priceColumn, javafx.scene.control.Label partNotFoundLabel)
    The partSearchTextField method checks the part search text field every time something is typed into the field and refreshes the parts table with a list of parts that match the beginning of the name or if it matches an id of a part, the part is selected.
    (package private) void
    partSearchTextFieldTyped()
    The partSearchTextFieldTyped method passes arguments to the partSearchTextField method.
    (package private) void
    productSearchTextFieldTyped()
    The productSearchTextFieldTyped method checks the product search text field every time something is typed into the field and refreshes the product table with a list of products that match the beginning of the id or name that matches what is currently in the text field.

      public MainController()

  • Method Details

    • partSearchTextFieldTyped

      void partSearchTextFieldTyped()
      The partSearchTextFieldTyped method passes arguments to the partSearchTextField method.

    • partSearchTextField

      static void partSearchTextField(javafx.scene.control.TextField textField, javafx.scene.control.TableView<Part> partTable, javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<Part,Integer> idColumn, javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<Part,String> nameColumn, javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<Part,Integer> inventoryColumn, javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<Part,Double> priceColumn, javafx.scene.control.Label partNotFoundLabel)
      The partSearchTextField method checks the part search text field every time something is typed into the field and refreshes the parts table with a list of parts that match the beginning of the name or if it matches an id of a part, the part is selected.
      Parameters:
      textField - the text field where parts are being searched for
      partTable - the table being searched
      idColumn - the id of the part
      nameColumn - the name of the part
      inventoryColumn - the stock quantity of the part
      priceColumn - the price of the part
      partNotFoundLabel - the label that displays the error message

    • addPartButtonClicked

      void addPartButtonClicked()
      The addPartButtonClicked method passes a title to the addOrModifyPart method for creation of a new part.

    • modifyPartButtonClicked

      void modifyPartButtonClicked()
      The modifyPartButtonClicked method passes the part selected in the part table on the main screen to the addOrModifyPart method for modification and passes a title for the window.

    • addOrModifyPart

      void addOrModifyPart(String title, Part part) throws IOException
      The addOrModifyPart method creates the stage and scene for the add/modify part window
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the window
      part - the part to be modified or null if a new part is being created
      Throws:
      IOException - throws exception if PartView.fxml is inaccessible

    • deletePartButtonClicked

      void deletePartButtonClicked()
      The deletePartButtonClicked method selects the part that is currently highlighted in the parts table on main page and pushes a confirmation alert to the user to confirm deletion of the part.

    • productSearchTextFieldTyped

      void productSearchTextFieldTyped()
      The productSearchTextFieldTyped method checks the product search text field every time something is typed into the field and refreshes the product table with a list of products that match the beginning of the id or name that matches what is currently in the text field. The search is case-insensitive.

    • addProductButtonClicked

      void addProductButtonClicked()
      The addProductButtonClicked method passes a title to the addOrModifyProduct method for creation of a new product.

    • modifyProductButtonClicked

      void modifyProductButtonClicked()
      The modifyProductButtonClicked method passes the product selected in the product table on the main screen to the addOrModifyProduct method for modification and passes a title for the window.

    • addOrModifyProduct

      void addOrModifyProduct(String title, Product product) throws IOException
      The addOrModifyProduct method creates the stage and scene for the add/modify product window
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the window
      product - the product to be modified or null if a new product is being created
      Throws:
      IOException - throws exception if ProductView.fxml is inaccessible

    • deleteProductButtonClicked

      void deleteProductButtonClicked()
      The deleteProductButtonClicked method selects the part that is currently highlighted in the parts table on main page and pushes a confirmation alert to the user to confirm deletion of the part.

    • refreshItemTable

      static <Item, ItemList extends javafx.collections.ObservableList<Item>> void refreshItemTable(ItemList itemList, javafx.scene.control.TableView<Item> itemTable, javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<Item,Integer> idColumn, javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<Item,String> nameColumn, javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<Item,Integer> inventoryColumn, javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<Item,Double> priceColumn)
      The refreshItemTable updates a given table with values from the itemList
      Type Parameters:
      Item - a part or product
      ItemList - a part table or product table
      Parameters:
      itemList - the ObservableList of parts or products populating the table
      itemTable - the part table or product table being initialized
      idColumn - id of the part or product
      nameColumn - name of the part or product
      inventoryColumn - stock of the part or product
      priceColumn - price of the part or product

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      The initialize method initializes buttons and populates tables.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

    • exitButtonClicked

      void exitButtonClicked()
      The exitButtonClicked method pushes a confirmation alert to the user to confirm exiting the program.

    • exitProgram

      public static void exitProgram()
      The exitProgram method displays a confirmation popup when the user attempts to exit the program, if the user clicks "OK", the program closes, otherwise the program remains open.
